main event: Captains from the USAF reported a sighting of an orange flame or light during a night flight on March 12, 1963.
interesting points: The object made a series of oscillating movements before fading from view,The sighting occurred at an altitude of 25,000 feet MSL,The observer's attention was directed by a light near their aircraft,The object was observed visually without optical aids,The weather conditions were clear on top of overcast.
witness description: Captain T. L. McKeever and Captain R. S. Stuart, both from R&D Project Office and highly reliable.
